Title: Adds home care visits to existing provisions of law prohibiting health care employers from requiring a nurse to work more than such nurse's regularly scheduled work hours
Summary: Adds home care visits to existing provisions of law prohibiting health care employers from requiring a nurse to work more than such nurse's regularly scheduled work hours, including regularly scheduled home care visits.
LawCode: Amd ยง167, Lab L; amd ยง6510-e, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the education law, in relation to the hours worked by nurses in home care settings
